title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The bug report is about the incorrect enablement of the "Build" popup action.
OB: The "Build" popup action is enabled even if the build process is already completed.
EB: The "Build" popup action should not be enabled if the build process is already completed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Start the build process.
2. Wait for the build process to complete.
3. Check if the "Build" popup action is still enabled after the build process is completed.
